problem.markdown: Which of the following are true for the Celsius scale? [x] It defines temperature as a linear function of the length of the liquid in the glass tube. [x] Its fixed points are chosen with respect to water or steam. [ ] It does not matter what fixed points are chosen, the scale remains unchanged. [ ] The scale is a thermodynamic scale – it does not depend on the liquid used.
